DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label , Phase 1b study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics efficacy RO5045337 combination cytarabine patient acute myelogenous leukemia . In Arm A , cohorts previously untreated patient deem unsuitable standard induction therapy receive escalate oral dos RO5045377 cytarabine 20 mg/m2 subcutaneously daily Days 1 10 28-day cycle . In Arm B , cohorts patient relapsed refractory least one cytarabine/anthracycline contain regimen receive escalate oral dos RO5045377 Days 1 5 cytarabine 1 gm/m2 intravenously Days 1 6 28-day cycle . Patients receive 4 cycle therapy , patient Arm A achieve hematologic response may continue additional cycle disease progression .
